items.sentence: It didn't look like you were having any fun.
It sounds like you had a successful meeting.
It looked like you weren't paying attention.
Just as long as I'm with you, I'll be happy.
Life here is much easier than it used to be.
I'm staying with my aunt for the time being.
I doubt if I could stop Tom from doing that.
I didn't realize that Tom needed to do that.
Tom goes jogging every day before breakfast.
Tom isn't really good at playing the guitar.
You don't have to tell that to your parents.
You can't understand this sentence, can you?
You can see some wild rabbits in the forest.
You can stay here as long as you keep quiet.
You shouldn't have said such a thing to Tom.
You know many interesting places, don't you?
You aren't leaving Boston for good, are you?
Tom didn't miss his watch until he got home.
Do you know any good restaurant around here?
How many people were present at the meeting?
